Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Well, tbh, GenAI, is not completely trustworthy, I have used it for assignments or also quizzes, but I have noticed, it does make mistakes and it is easier to manipulate AI, suppose when I am doing a quiz and gives me answer and I say Oh but this is not a correct answer in the book or Google, then AI will give me a different answer, which is just feel like not trustworthy.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Human intelligence  is still way better/helpful than Artificial intelligence, but there is no deny in the fact it has made the life much easier.
